text: Billy Baldwin may refer to: * Billy Baldwin (decorator) (1903–1983), New York decorator * Bill Baldwin (footballer) (1907–1982), English footballer/soccer player * Bill Baldwin (1935–2015), American science fiction author * Billy Baldwin (baseball) (1951–2011), Major League Baseball outfielder * William Baldwin (born 1963), American actor ==See also== * William Baldwin (disambiguation)
title: Billy Baldwin
